item.title: Gessler at Daquise
item.author: Wei Kheng,Tadeusz Kurpaski,Sheena Lee,
item.description: Established in 1947, Daquise Restaurant on Thurloe St. never fails to transport alumnis down memory lane. Mr. Gessler, a prominent figure in the restaurant scene in Poland, has recently acquired into one of the longest serving Polish restaurants in London where impeccable food quality is coupled â€¦
